summary: An ordinance authorizing the City Engineering to negotiate for, and to acquire by purchase, property and property rights necessary for the widening of 15th Avenue Northwest between Shilshole Avenue and Ballard Way, pending condemnation proceedings under Ordinance No. 85664; and making an appropriation from the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds 1954 Fund therefor, and to pay certain agreed condemnation awards when accepted by the City Council.
